column4: been trying to convince the parents to get wireless for ages but i'm the only one here who needs it
I used to connect it to this same laptop when it had windows as the os
Yumbo, it does give windows an aditional brownie point over ubuntu for me.
as windows never had this problem
back to hijacking the neighbours wifi then till I can afford a router.
thanks so much for your time though yumbo, wish i'd mentioned it was a modem earlier, could have prevented wasting your time.
I don't really get how it would work on the same laptop in windows and not ubuntu though?
its the same mac address to your ISP, so there isnt any reason why it shouldnt work
so it's more to do with the fact that windows are sneaky buggers rather than them being better
tbh, i preferred older versions of ubuntu. had ubuntu on my old laptop and it was perfect.
what's the router you'd reccomend Yumbo?
and you reckon it'd be easy to set up?
what model modem do you have joe335
thats got a built in router
